sentences.english: A cloth had been spread over a little round table on which was a vase of fragrant plum blossom.
sentences.chinese: 小圓桌鋪上了檯布，添了瓶盛開的臘梅，吐着幽香。

sentences.english: It was winter, but the air in the campus was fragrant because of winter sweets.
sentences.chinese: 當時是冬天，但校園的空氣因爲臘梅而變得清香。

sentences.english: The branch of La plum also already answer last very thick accumulated snow.
sentences.chinese: 臘梅的枝椏也已經覆上了厚厚的積雪。

sentences.english: Wintersweet usually blossoms in mid-to-late December in some southern cities of China.
sentences.chinese: 中國南方一些城市的臘梅一般在十二月中下旬開放。

sentences.english: Colorful gerbera daisies highlight the rich coloration of a spicebush swallowtail butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 華美的非洲菊加亮這富有的着色的洋臘梅燕尾蝶。

sentences.english: Chimonanthus fragrans, in English the Winter-sweet, should have a place of honour.
sentences.chinese: 對於臘梅，英語叫做冬季甜香，應該給予尊敬。

definition: lit. the duck is the first to know if the spring water is warm (idiom)/fig. an expert in the field knows which way the wind blows
pinyin: chun1 jiang1 shui3 nuan3 ya1 xian1 zhi1

definition: delicate hands/woman's tender and soft hands
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
